Interface Message

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientDisconnectMessage, ClientMessage, DiscardCargoMessage, DiscardComponentMessage, EnterLobbyMessage, EnterSetupMessage, LeaveSetupMessage, MoveCargoMessage, NotifyStateUpdateMessage, OpenLobbyMessage, OpenUnfinishedMessage, PingMessage, PlayerGiveUpMessage, PutComponentMessage, RemoveComponentMessage, RemoveCrewMessage, ReserveComponentMessage, SelectBlobMessage, SelectLandingMessage, SendContinueMessage, ServerConnectMessage, ServerDisconnectMessage, ServerMessage, SetCrewMessage, TakeCargoMessage, TakeComponentMessage, TakeDiscardedComponentMessage, TakeRewardMessage, ToggleHourglassMessage, TurnOnMessage, UsernameSetupMessage, ViewMessage
public interface Message extends Serializable
Interface representing a serializable object to be inherited by all message classes.
